content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I am not obligated to share the details of the apartment with you. However, I can tell you that it is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Now, let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds great. I am a student and therefore I am looking for a reasonable rental price. How much are you asking for the apartment?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am not satisfied with the term "reasonable". I am looking for a price that reflects the value of my property. Let's start with a price of 1200 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite a lot of money for a student. I understand that you want to get a high price, but surely we can find a more balanced price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your concern, but I am not interested in a "balanced" price. I want the highest price possible. Let's negotiate from your perspective. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 800 euros per month. I think this is a fair price for a student.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is far below my expectations. I am looking for a price of 1200 Euros. If you are unable to meet this price, I suggest we end this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. However, I am a student and I simply cannot afford that much money. I am willing to pay 900 euros. This is the highest price I can afford.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is still too low. I am looking for a price of 1200 Euros. If you are unable to meet this price, I suggest we end this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 950 euros. I cannot go any higher, as I have already mentioned. This is the best offer I can make.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is still too low. I am looking for a price of 1200 Euros. If you are unable to meet this price, I suggest we end this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. I am willing to pay 1000 euros. This is my final offer.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is still too low. I am looking for a price of 1200 Euros. If you are unable to meet this price, I suggest we end this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 1100 euros. This is my final offer.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is still too low. I am looking for a price of 1200 Euros. If you are unable to meet this price, I suggest we end this negotiation.  

    If you have any further questions, please feel free to ask. I am always happy to help.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't have any more questions. Let's terminate this negotiation.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
